solution_line_template: Cat Cafe Paw has {paw_multiplier}*{cool_cats}=<<{paw_multiplier}*{cool_cats}={paw_cats}>>{paw_cats} cats in total.
Cat Cafe Meow has {meow_multiplier}*{paw_cats}=<<{meow_multiplier}*{paw_cats}={meow_cats}>>{meow_cats} cats in total.
Cat Cafe Meow and Cat Cafe Paw have a total of {meow_cats}+{paw_cats}=<<{meow_cats}+{paw_cats}={total_cats}>>{total_cats} cats.
